remarks: The predicate "is a translation".  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
trnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trnset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
trnset.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
trnset.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
trnset.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
trnset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
trnset.l $e |- L = ( Dil ` K ) $.
trnset.t $e |- T = ( Trn ` K ) $.
istrnN $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ D e. A ) -> ( F e. ( T ` D ) <-> ( F e. ( L ` D ) /\ A. q e. ( W ` D ) A. r e. ( W ` D ) ( ( q .+ ( F ` q ) ) i^i ( ._|_ ` { D } ) ) = ( ( r .+ ( F ` r ) ) i^i ( ._|_ ` { D } ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d D q r $.
$d F q r $.
$d K q r $.
$d W q r $.
